content.rendered: The goal of the game is not to lose as early as possible and to score as many points as possible. Improve your accuracy thanks to very competent rolling of balls. The more blocks with balls you destroy, the more points you accumulate. Check your results in the world rankings, maybe you are already number 1.Advantages of the game:- endless level;- global rating;- increasing accuracy, accuracy;- relaxation after a hard day;- you can play at work by minimizing or opening the game tab at the right time.- attention, the game is very addictive!
